Description: On I-64 at mile marker 153 in the County of Goochland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 15.6 in the County of Alleghany, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-564 at mile marker 0.7 in the City of Norfolk, near Terminal Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
